level.text: Storage charges may be charged by a consumer goods repair dealer in the following circumstances:
If the customer has been notified of the following:
The date after which storage charges will begin to accrue; and
The cost of the storage charges;
If the customer has failed to call the dealer for oral communication of an estimate as required in ยง 634; or
If the Department, upon review under ยง 622, has determined that the dealer is entitled to storage charges.
